title: Submarine Atmosphere Control Predictive Maintenance
description: A submarine's atmosphere control system reports slightly elevated CO2 levels, predicting a potential failure in the CO2 scrubbers.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the atmosphere monitoring alert and review the trend data for CO2 levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineering officer confirms a slow but steady rise in CO2.

tasks.description: Switch to the backup CO2 scrubber system to stabilize the atmosphere.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer successfully engages the backup system, and CO2 levels return to normal.

tasks.description: Log the fault and schedule a replacement of the primary scrubber filter material at the next port visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer ensures the fault is documented and a repair is scheduled to restore full redundancy.
